publishing_focus.primary_focus: Specialty tarot decks, oracle cards, and fortune telling books.
publishing_focus.target_audience: Spiritualists, psychics, and enthusiasts of the esoteric and occult.
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We offer unique, artistically designed tarot and oracle decks that can't be found anywhere else. Our publications are designed to enthrall and engage with readers on a profound level.
publishing_focus.example_titles: ‘The Ethereal Oracle Deck’, ‘Fortune Telling for Modern Mystics’
